name: CheeseBot 6000
description:
OBJECTIVE: EAT THE CHEESE. WARNING: BATTERY LOW. MUST GET TO CHEESE... Controls: Arrows:  Move X:  Pick up item / Confirm C:  Restart level / Back

This is a puzzle game made in 48 hours for the 2020 Miz Jam 1 (submission page), with the Pixel Vision 8 Fantasy Console. 

Open doors, break walls and slay enemies to accomplish your life goal of getting cheese. Make sure not to run out of power!

Additional info:

If you want to make the game bigger, go into your executable's "Content" folder and open up the bios.json file. You can change the scale by adding the following:  "Scale": 3 PV8 supports scales from 2 - 6. If you have already run the game, you'll need to find the user-bios.json file in the local shared folder. Just modify the scale value in there.  The exit button just crashes the game, it's not great

The sound effects might not play correctly occasionally

Note: the Mac/Linux builds have not been tested, they might be buggy (I don't have devices to test with, sorry)
